/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, mostly painted in shades of gray and white, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. A few trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of green to the urban setting. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, creating a harmonious balance between man-made structures and nature.
